kingdom.quote: Small opportunities are often the beginning of great enterprises
kingdom.long_description: The Greeklings as a great and varied people, trying to expand their civilisation all over this earth.
kingdom.post_selection_description: A society of wise, brave Greeklings.

town_banner_guardian_ghost.description: How you know you've come home.
town_banner_guardian_ghost.town_bonus_description:
This settlement will be a bustling hub of trade.
  • Roads give 3x their normal speed boost
  • Your items sell for 50% more
  • Traders will bring 2x the goods and Gold

town_banner_guardian_token_iconic.description: A shred from the Banner of Cunning, carrying along its magic.

town_banner_might_ghost.description: How you know you've come home
town_banner_might_ghost.town_bonus_description:
This settlement will grow strong through earth and steel.
  • Mining gives 50% more Ore, Stone, and Clay
  • Hearthlings no longer mind cramped spaces

town_banner_might_token_iconic.description: A shred from the Banner of Strength, carrying along its magic.

town_banner_nature_ghost.description: How you know you've come home
town_banner_nature_ghost.town_bonus_description:
This settlement shall be at one with the environment.
  • Trees produce 25% more Wood
  • Both Plants and Crops grow 25% faster
  • Plants have 2x their normal Appeal

town_banner_nature_token_iconic.description: A shred from the Banner of Vitality, carrying along its magic.
